jasperReport.name: quote
jasperReport.queryString: SELECT qe.quote_id, qe.expiration_date as expiry, myorg.org_id as myorgid, quoteorg.org_id as quoteorgid, issued, ct.namefirst as contactnamefirst, ct.namelast as contactnamelast, ctent.namelast as enteredbylastname, ctent.namefirst as enteredbyfirstname, quoteorg.name as quoteorgname, myorg.name as myorgname, group_id, version FROM organization myorg, quote_entry qe LEFT JOIN contact ct ON (qe.contact_id = ct.contact_id) LEFT JOIN access ent ON (qe.enteredby = ent.user_id) LEFT JOIN contact ctent ON (ent.contact_id = ctent.contact_id) LEFT JOIN organization quoteorg ON (qe.org_id = quoteorg.org_id) WHERE myorg.org_id = 0 AND quote_id = $P{quote_id}
